NK036(chi)010:0: shin tu spros pa med pa'i skal ldan gyi dbang
NK036(chi)010:1: bzhugs so lung med rgya gar skad du ma h+aa
NK036(chi)010:2: san+ti a b+hi she na ka ru ra n+aa mo
NK036(chi)010:3: bod skad du rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang
NK036(chi)010:4: bskur ba bya rtsol las 'das pa'i lugs bcom ldan
NK036(chi)010:5: 'das bya rtsol ka dag nyid la phyag 'tshal lo
NK036(chi)010:6: // gang 'dir 'bras bu smin byed pa'i rang bzhin
NK036(chi)010:7: gnas lugs mtshon pa'i phyir ye shes rtsol sgrub bral
NK036(chi)010:8: ba'i don snying po bla med don mchog gis da
NK036(chi)010:9: lta nyid du thob bya'i phyir gsang sngags thabs kyi
NK036(chi)010:10: mtshon tshul las 'dir ni bya rtsol bral ba'i chos
NK036(chi)010:11: gsang mchog dbang rnams bskur 'dod pa'i don gyi dbang
NK036(chi)010:12: bskur bshad par bya lus bcas rtsol sgrub med pa
NK036(chi)010:13: yis ma bskur ye rdzogs don de nyid ma byas
NK036(chi)010:14: bzhag pa'i rang bzhin du thog mar babs kyis grub
NK036(chi)010:15: pa'i lugs rnam dag srid gsum yongs grol zhing stong
NK036(chi)010:16: gsum ye rgyas btab pa'i dbang rim min cig car
NK036(chi)010:17: 'jug pa'i tshul rang gnas babs lugs chen po'i dbang
NK036(chi)010:18: dbang po rab kyi yang rab kyi don du yi
NK036(chi)010:19: ge 'di brtsams bkod de yang gzhi nas grub pa'i
NK036(chi)010:20: phyir glo bur btsan thabs yang min te rang la
NK036(chi)010:21: gnas pa'i ye shes nyid dbang pos rab kyi yang
NK036(chi)010:22: rab kyi don du yi ge 'di brtsams bkod de
NK036(chi)010:23: yang gzhi nas grub pa'i phyir glo bur btsan thabs
NK036(chi)010:24: yang min te rang la gnas pa'i ye shes nyid
NK036(chi)010:25: dbang pos dngos su blta don du nges pa'i dbang
NK036(chi)010:26: 'dis rdul tshon nas ye shes cig char 'jug pa'i
NK036(chi)010:27: phyir lha sngags dam rdzas ma brten par gnas lugs
NK036(chi)010:28: tshig gis mtshon byas nas rtsal dbang ma bskur rdzogs
NK036(chi)010:29: pa'i don dad brtson shes rab ldan pa yis skal
NK036(chi)010:30: ldan snying gi bu gcig la gcig dang gnyis dang
NK036(chi)010:31: // gsum la ni / nges par nyams su myong
NK036(chi)010:32: ba'i gnad bskur lugs 'di la brten nas ni cig
NK036(chi)010:33: char don du 'di bstan pas 'di ltar skyod cig
NK036(chi)010:34: sa ma y+aa 'di nyid gsang sngags kun gyi bcud
NK036(chi)010:35: ma btsal bzhag pa'i don de ni bdag gis brda'
NK036(chi)010:36: la brten nas kyang shes rab kyis ni dpyad med
NK036(chi)010:37: par dbang po'i sgo la mngon sum du snang ba
NK036(chi)010:38: ye shes gtan dbab phyir 'di ltar nges pa'i don
NK036(chi)010:39: 'jug bgyi 'dir gsang ba ngo bo nyid kyi dbang
NK036(chi)010:40: bskur thob par 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di ltar 'jug
NK036(chi)010:41: par bya'o de yang bla ma lung dang ldan pa
NK036(chi)010:42: rab tu gces te lung dang mi ldan pa'am dam
NK036(chi)010:43: tshig med pa'am 'jig rten gyi rnyed bkur la sems
NK036(chi)010:44: pa'am gsang sngags lung bzhin mi 'dzin pa'am rgyud la
NK036(chi)010:45: dgongs pa mi gnas pa'am rig pa mngon sum du
NK036(chi)010:46: ma mthong bas ni dbang bskur du rung ba ma
NK036(chi)010:47: yin te 'di lta bu'i bla mas dbang bskur na
NK036(chi)010:48: lam log par 'dren pas na log 'dren zhes bya'o
NK036(chi)010:49: 'dis dbang bskur ma lus sems chud zos pa'i steng
NK036(chi)010:50: du rdo rje'i dmyal bar mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du
NK036(chi)010:51: dpon slob gnyis ka sems kyi snang bar 'gyur ro
NK036(chi)010:52: de'i phyir na mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bla ma
NK036(chi)010:53: rab tu gces so slob ma yang su rung rung
NK036(chi)010:54: la bya ba ma yin te rtsol bral gi dbang
NK036(chi)010:55: la 'jug pa'i dad pa can 'khor ba la yid
NK036(chi)010:56: dbyung dad pa la skyo ngal med pa dang 'jig
NK036(chi)010:57: rten gyi nor la chags pa med cing gtong nus
NK036(chi)010:58: pa dang shes rab chen po mchog gi blo rgyas
NK036(chi)010:59: pa dang gsang sngags la sri zhu khyad par can
NK036(chi)010:60: gyis rab tu zhu ba dang bla ma la gus
NK036(chi)010:61: shing dbang po dul ba dang nga rgyal dang bral
NK036(chi)010:62: zhing chog shes pa dang skye shi gnyis la bred
NK036(chi)010:63: pa'i gang zag gis 'jug par bya ba yin gyis
NK036(chi)010:64: 'di lta bu dang mi ldan pas dbang bskur zhus
NK036(chi)010:65: na dpon slob gnyis ka sems kyi snang ba rdo
NK036(chi)010:66: rje dmyal bar sems par 'gyur ro des na thog
NK036(chi)010:67: ma nas brtsams pa mchog yin no 'di ni dper
NK036(chi)010:68: na rtsigs pa'i rming legs pa dang 'dra ste rming
NK036(chi)010:69: legs na rtse la blang kyang nyes pa'i skyon mi
NK036(chi)010:70: 'ong ste de'i phyir na bla ma lung dang ldan
NK036(chi)010:71: zhing slob ma dad brtson shes rab dang ldan pa
NK036(chi)010:72: gal che'o da ni bla ma'i bya ba bstan pa
NK036(chi)010:73: ni de nas skal ldan la dbang bskur ba'i don
NK036(chi)010:74: du bla mas rang gi lus bkrus nas rang gi
NK036(chi)010:75: bla ma la yon 'bul ba dang gsol ba btab
NK036(chi)010:76: nas dbang bskyar te zhus la bla ma mnyes par
NK036(chi)010:77: bya gal te bla ma mi bzhugs na bla ma'i
NK036(chi)010:78: sku gsung thugs la shes pa gtad de zhag bdun
NK036(chi)010:79: nam bcu gcig tshun du gsol ba gdab cing bsgom
NK036(chi)010:80: par bya'o de ltar byas pas dngos sam rmi lam
NK036(chi)010:81: ltas su rang gi bla ma byon nas chos ston
NK036(chi)010:82: pa la sogs pa'i rtags 'byung ngo gal te bla
NK036(chi)010:83: ma rang du ma byung yang gzhan gyis ston pa
NK036(chi)010:84: la sogs pa dang chos kyi gtam byed pa la
NK036(chi)010:85: sogs pa byung ngo de nas dur khrod du zhag
NK036(chi)010:86: gsum mam lnga'i bar du spyod pa brtsams te 'khor
NK036(chi)010:87: 'das ru shan 'byed pa'i spyod par bya de ltar
NK036(chi)010:88: spyod pa byas pas lus ngag gi rtags 'byung ste
NK036(chi)010:89: de nas yang ri khrod dam shin tu dben pa'i
NK036(chi)010:90: sar phyin te rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud
NK036(chi)010:91: la nyams su blangs te zhag bdun nam bcu gcig
NK036(chi)010:92: gam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu nyams su blang bar
NK036(chi)010:93: bya'o de nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i gnas
NK036(chi)010:94: khang du 'ongs te slob ma dad pa can gnyis
NK036(chi)010:95: dang gsum tshun chod las mang du mi rung ste
NK036(chi)010:96: shin tu brtags la bya'o de nas slob ma'i bya
NK036(chi)010:97: ba bla mas bslab slob ma kun khrus nas bton
NK036(chi)010:98: gos barjesa la dad mos dang ldan par gnas so
NK036(chi)010:99: bla mas bgegs bsrung ba'i phyir yi ge brgyad kyi
NK036(chi)010:100: rgyas gdab par bya ste thog mar h'u gis rgyas
NK036(chi)010:101: gdab pa ni slob ma'i stod g.yogs rnams phud te
NK036(chi)010:102: lus stangs stabs kyi tshul du bya ste h'u zhes
NK036(chi)010:103: ngar dang bcas te brjod nas slob ma'i rtsa gsum
NK036(chi)010:104: pa can bya ba snying gi rtse na mngon yod
NK036(chi)010:105: pa de'i nang du 'phang ngo slob ma rang gi
NK036(chi)010:106: lus h'u sngo skya ba chen po zhig tu bsgom
NK036(chi)010:107: du gzhug go de'i rjes la yi ge yam gcig
NK036(chi)010:108: thon te slob ma'i spyi bo nas rkang mthing gi
NK036(chi)010:109: bar du rtsa rig byed bya ba yod do der
NK036(chi)010:110: zhugs par bsam zhing slob ma lus yi ge yam
NK036(chi)010:111: ljang gu chen po zhig tu byas te bsgom du
NK036(chi)010:112: gzhug go de bzhin du yi ge ram lte bar
NK036(chi)010:113: bya ste go rim bzhin du bya'o mgrin par kham
NK036(chi)010:114: dpral bar e lkog mar su de ltar byas nas
NK036(chi)010:115: rang gi lus gcer bur phyungs te rig pa yi
NK036(chi)010:116: ge ha dang bcas pa bsgoms la ngag tu ha
NK036(chi)010:117: ha d+ha d+ha zhes drag par bsgrags pas slob ma'i
NK036(chi)010:118: lus ngag yid gsum 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag par
NK036(chi)010:119: byas nas lus lha chen po zhig tu bsgom du
NK036(chi)010:120: gzhug go yang phata ces shin tu drag par brjod
NK036(chi)010:121: nas slob ma'i snying la bcug pas slob mas kyang
NK036(chi)010:122: phata ces drag tu shugs dang bcas pas drag la
NK036(chi)010:123: thung bar zlos su bcug la bgegs rnams mi rtog
NK036(chi)010:124: pa'i yi ge brgyad kyis rang gnas rtsa ba'i rang
NK036(chi)010:125: skad dang bcas pas bsrungs la slob ma kun dur
NK036(chi)010:126: khrod du ma phyin gyi bar la phata drag tu
NK036(chi)010:127: bzlas la de nas dur khrod du phyin pa dang
NK036(chi)010:128: gtor ma zhig btang la lus kyi spyod pa zhag
NK036(chi)010:129: gcig tu bya ste de nas ngag ru shan 'byed
NK036(chi)010:130: pa'i spyod pa bya de nas sems kyi spyod pa'i
NK036(chi)010:131: man ngag la bslabs te zhag gcig tu bya'o de
NK036(chi)010:132: ltar zhag gsum du lus ngag yid gsum zhen pa
NK036(chi)010:133: bzlog pa'i spyod pa byas pas lus ngag sems la
NK036(chi)010:134: bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba dang de ltar byas
NK036(chi)010:135: pas lus ngag gi zhen pa rang log pa'i dgos
NK036(chi)010:136: pa yod pa'o de nas gnas khang du 'ong ste
NK036(chi)010:137: bla ma la bya rtsol dang bral ba'i rang bzhin
NK036(chi)010:138: rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang du zhu bar bya ste
NK036(chi)010:139: rang la yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas shin tu gces
NK036(chi)010:140: pa bla ma la bzhed pa med kyang phul te
NK036(chi)010:141: mnyes par byas la gser la sogs pa'i man+dala phul
NK036(chi)010:142: de bzhin du 'bru dang dri bzang sna tshog dang
NK036(chi)010:143: me tog la sogs pa'i man+dala rnams bla ma la
NK036(chi)010:144: phul dbang zhu'o de nas bla mas slob ma rjes
NK036(chi)010:145: su bzung ba'i phyir dbang bskur dngos gzhi'i gdams ngag
NK036(chi)010:146: 'di lta ste gnas der dmigs pa'i rten la brten
NK036(chi)010:147: nas gzhi mtshon pa'i phyir dri sna tshogs pa'i man+dala
NK036(chi)010:148: mda' gang gru bzhi pa'am yang na zlum po shin
NK036(chi)010:149: tu mnyam par byas te de'i steng du kha dog
NK036(chi)010:150: re res gtso byas pa'i me tog tshom bu sna
NK036(chi)010:151: lnga ste lnga tshan lnga dgram 'phags pa rnams mchod
NK036(chi)010:152: pa'i phyir me tog dang mar me la sogs pa
NK036(chi)010:153: yang 'byor tshad bsham 'jig rten pa'i bar chad zhi
NK036(chi)010:154: bar bya ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro ma dang chos skyong
NK036(chi)010:155: rnams la gtor tshogs kyang shin tu bzang bar bsham
NK036(chi)010:156: mo bla ma bka' brgyud rnams la gsol ba 'debs
NK036(chi)010:157: pa la sogs gong ltar byas la de nas slob
NK036(chi)010:158: ma 'khor ba la blo dor bar bya ba'i phyir
NK036(chi)010:159: nyes dmigs dang dad pa bskyed pa la sogs pa'i
NK036(chi)010:160: chos rnams bshad do gzhan yang chos kyi sku'i snang
NK036(chi)010:161: ba ma mthong gi bar du cis kyang dgos pa
NK036(chi)010:162: med snyam du gzhug go de nas slob ma re
NK036(chi)010:163: re nas dbang bkur ba ni man+dala dbul ba la
NK036(chi)010:164: sogs pa byas la me tog 'bul ba ni lus
NK036(chi)010:165: gcer bur phyung la 'greng tshugs su langs te rkang
NK036(chi)010:166: pa'i long bu gnyis gshibs la lus bsrang thal mo
NK036(chi)010:167: snying gar sbyar la skal ldan gyi shes pa bla
NK036(chi)010:168: ma'i thugs kyi dkyil du gtad nas sems gzhan du
NK036(chi)010:169: skad cig kyang ma yengs par shes pa bla ma'i
NK036(chi)010:170: thugs la bcug la bsgom du gzhug go bla mas
NK036(chi)010:171: kho'i shes pa mi btang ba'i phyir yi ge a
NK036(chi)010:172: drug brtsegs kyis rgyas gdab bo de yang slob ma'i
NK036(chi)010:173: rig pa la dmigs te ngag tu yang a drug
NK036(chi)010:174: brjod cing bu'i rig pa bzung bas skal ldan gyi
NK036(chi)010:175: lus kyang je nye je nye la rtsa ru yod
NK036(chi)010:176: par 'gyur ro lus g.yo ba dang ngag smra ba
NK036(chi)010:177: dang sems 'phar ba dang de ltar byung na rab
NK036(chi)010:178: tu bzang ba yin no de nas rig pa'i me
NK036(chi)010:179: tog sngon du bla ma la dbul bar bya'o de
NK036(chi)010:180: nas bla mas rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang
NK036(chi)010:181: bskur ba ni skal ldan de'i lus kyi gnad gong
NK036(chi)010:182: ltar byed du bcug ste shar phyogs su kha bltas
NK036(chi)010:183: la bla mas 'di skad brjod do e ma skal
NK036(chi)010:184: ba dang ldan pa khyod shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i
NK036(chi)010:185: khams na phar gam gam song zhig dang zhes brjod
NK036(chi)010:186: cing skal ldan des kyang gom par 'bor bar bsgom
NK036(chi)010:187: du gzhug go de bzhin du lho dang nub dang
NK036(chi)010:188: byang rnams su yang de ltar bya'o nyams kyi rtags
NK036(chi)010:189: ma byung na brda' des bkrol lo de nas bla
NK036(chi)010:190: mas nam mkha' la phyag yug yug pa lan gsum
NK036(chi)010:191: byas la ngag tu 'di skad brjod do e ma
NK036(chi)010:192: skal ba dang ldan pa khyod nam mkha'i dkyil du
NK036(chi)010:193: yar ltos dang steng na nyi ma lnga shar nas
NK036(chi)010:194: 'dug pa la mig gis ltos dang nyi ma'i 'od
NK036(chi)010:195: zer 'phro ba 'di la mig gis tshugs sam zhes
NK036(chi)010:196: // gsum la ni / pa dang / 'o nyi
NK036(chi)010:197: ma de la shes pa gtod la nam mkha'i steng
NK036(chi)010:198: na yar la je mtho je mtho song la slar
NK036(chi)010:199: ma log cig ces pa dang yang bla mas langs
NK036(chi)010:200: te g.yas brkyang ba'i 'dug stangs kyis rang gi mig
NK036(chi)010:201: gnyis la mdzub mo btsugs la a a zhes brjod
NK036(chi)010:202: cing phyogs bzhir blta'o yang mdzub mo nam mkha' la
NK036(chi)010:203: bsgrengs te mig nam mkha' la bgrad nas har re
NK036(chi)010:204: // gsum la ni / pa dang / blta ba
NK036(chi)010:205: dang / ngag tu ni nam mkha' 'di ni rgya
NK036(chi)010:206: che'o zhes lan gsum bya'o de ltar dbang de rnams
NK036(chi)010:207: rdzogs nas kun gyi nyams dri'o skal ba dang ldan
NK036(chi)010:208: na ci lta ba bzhin du go bas te gal
NK036(chi)010:209: te ma go na brda' bkrol bas bla ma'i man
NK036(chi)010:210: ngag dam par 'gyur bas so de nas rig pa
NK036(chi)010:211: mngon sum gyi man ngag btab pa nyams su len
NK036(chi)010:212: du gzhug go shin tu spros pa med pa'i skal
NK036(chi)010:213: ldan gyi dbang rdzogs so rgya gar gyi mkhan po
NK036(chi)010:214: bi ma mi tras sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o
NK036(chi)010:215: spros pa la dga' ba rnams kyis ni dbang gi
